name: Paper Ball
description:
Pitch :

Hello everyone,

The name's game is Paper Ball. It's my first developpement project in LUA. It's a Flappy Bird Like but you are a paper ball and you have to pass between pencils. The background is a board with severals things like mathmatics, alphabet and a LUA code and also, you have the score integrated on the board.

In gameover's menu and main menu you have your high score.

Good Game ! 

Controls :

The controls are very simple. You are jumping with the up arrow and it's finish...

In the main menu you press the X button for launch the game and in gameover's menu you press X for come back in main menu.

Specially thanks at you if you play my game and do not hesitate to give your opinion in the comments.
